actions.name: Set mesh size
actions.description: Create or remove a mesh of points across the object. A mesh allows for distortion by moving the points.

params.name: Columns
params.description: Number of mesh points horizontally. Use at least 2 to create a mesh, or 0 to remove the mesh.

params.name: Rows
params.description: Number of mesh points vertically. Use at least 2 to create a mesh, or 0 to remove the mesh.

actions.name: Set mesh point
actions.description: Set the position and texture co-ordinates of a point on the object's mesh.
actions.display_text: Set mesh point ([i]{0}[/i], [i]{1}[/i]) to [i]{2}[/i] position ([i]{3}[/i], [i]{4}[/i]), Z elevation [i]{5}[/i], texture ([i]{6}[/i], [i]{7}[/i])

params.name: Column
params.description: Zero-based column number of the mesh point to set.

params.name: Row
params.description: Zero-based row number of the mesh point to set.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to set points using absolute values within the object's box, or apply a relative displacement from its default position.

params.name: Position X
params.description: X position of the mesh point, from 0-1 within to the object's box.

params.name: Position Y
params.description: Y position of the mesh point, from 0-1 within to the object's box.

params.name: Texture X
params.description: X co-ordinate of the object image at the mesh point, from 0-1 within the object's box. Use -1 in absolute mode, or 0 in relative mode, to leave unchanged.

params.name: Texture Y
params.description: Y co-ordinate of the object image at the mesh point, from 0-1 within the object's box. Use -1 in absolute mode, or 0 in relative mode, to leave unchanged.

params.name: Z elevation
params.description: Z elevation of the mesh point, as an absolute value (relative mode does not apply). Negative Z elevations are not allowed.
